title: This is the one quirky thing about Ryan Gosling that concerns Emma Stone
text:
This is the one quirky thing about Ryan Gosling that concerns Emma Stone To most of us civilians, it seems as though Ryan Gosling is pretty much the perfect human. Of course, we’re certain that’s not true, considering he’s, you know, human. But still, he appears to be perfection. However, Emma Stone might disagree due to Gosling’s food addiction , which has her very concerned .
The addiction? Snacking. The man loves snacks.
And we totally get it. Because snacks.
Emma dished about her La La Land co-star to Marie Claire , and she uncovered quite the revelation: Gosling hides snacks in his costumes. (So now we obviously love him even more, because that is something WE WOULD TOTALLY DO.)
The co-stars have starred in three films together — Crazy Stupid Love , Gangster Squad and La La Land , which would explain why they know a thing or two about each other’s quirks. Stone told Marie Claire, 
“He loves Twizzlers. He used to eat so many on set it was concerning. He had them in his suit pocket. Bring him some Twizzlers if you want to get on his good side.” Def Twizzlers in his pockets here: Summit Entertainment Twizzlers are delicious, so all of this makes so much sense. In fact, hiding Twizzlers in accessible places sounds like a really great idea, and it’s kind of surprising that we haven’t thought it this before.
Here’s Gosling reaching for Twizzlers: Summit Entertainment OKAY, so if you ever run into Gosling and want to make a good impression, offer him some Twizzlers. Which means, you’ll need to carry around a supply of Twizzlers at all times, but it’ll be so worth it, probably.
